backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining story, user, and profile types with access‑controlled CRUD operations and mixins for auth and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing onboarding, navigation, and PWA cache‑fix features with related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plaintext mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing their functionality and recent fixes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the app root, PWA manifest, meta tags, and main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, categories, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache version v6 with app‑shell caching, network‑first navigation, and stale‑while‑revalidate for assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router, splash and onboarding flow, service worker registration, and route layout logic.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Shows a simple ad placeholder unless the user is premium or in preview mode, rendering a banner or inline variant.
frontend/src/components/AppButton.tsx: Provides a wrapped button with enforced style variants and size options to prevent production styling regressions.
frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Renders a left-side navigation drawer with main links, optional story creation, and a premium upsell section.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Displays the top app header with a menu button, logo, and user avatar loaded from the profile hook.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Implements a fixed bottom tab bar with navigation icons, labels, and active-state detection.
frontend/src/components/ButtonStyleRegre: Dev‑only panel rendering multiple AppButton variants to visually detect styling issues.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Shows a horizontal scrollable list of categories filtered by mode and navigates to the selected category.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Displays the user's most recently read story with cover, progress indicator, and quick navigation.
frontend/src/components/DailyStoryNotifi: Shows a dismissible banner announcing the daily featured story and hides itself for 24 hours after dismissal.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Prompts users to install the PWA when installable, offering install and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Displays an interstitial ad modal with a countdown unless the user is premium or in preview mode.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown to switch the app's language using the preferences context.
frontend/src/components/LegalSupportPage: Page layout with a back button, wrapper card, and footer for legal/support pages.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query clearing and localized labels.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Toggle buttons to switch between adults and kids reading modes.
frontend/src/components/MyStoryCard.tsx: Displays a user's story with cover, summary, metadata, and edit/read actions.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Implements a three‑step onboarding wizard that saves language, mode, and theme preferences.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Provides direction‑aware animated transitions for onboarding steps with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Generic page layout wrapper with optional title and standardized spacing.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Renders different variants of a premium badge using crown icon and gradient styles.
Popover with controls for font size, background theme, and auto-scroll settings.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Shows a dismissible top banner reminding users about new stories.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Gatekeeper component that prompts login if the user isn't authenticated.
frontend/src/components/RouteErrorFallba: Fallback UI for route errors with message and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Share button supporting Web Share API or link copy with toast feedback and share tracking.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Fullscreen splash screen with app icon, branding, taglines, and loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Story preview card supporting featured and normal modes with navigation and premium handling.
frontend/src/components/StoryCardSkeleto: Renders a skeleton placeholder layout for a story card using multiple Skeleton components.
frontend/src/components/TopBanner.tsx: Displays a dismissible top banner with variant styles, optional icon, and title/description.
Shows a translation prompt banner with a translate button and a temporary placeholder message after use.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user avatar with fallback icon, size variants, and optional loading overlay.
Manages user preference state such as language, mode, and reading settings with persistence and auto‑detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Handles user state from backend or guest storage, including preferences, premium status, and updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Fetches and toggles favorite stories using backend actor and react‑query with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyStories.ts: Fetches the authenticated user's stories using the backend actor if supported, falling back to an empty list.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Implements localStorage‑based offline story downloads, providing functions to save, remove, and retrieve stories.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and subscribes to the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion setting using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Manages the PWA install prompt, including deferred events, dismissal timing, and triggering installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks reading history for guests via localStorage and authenticated users via app state, supporting progress updates and retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides queries for fetching filtered story lists, single stories, and the daily featured story from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoryEditor.ts: Handles loading and saving stories through the backend actor, supporting creation, updates, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates user profiles for authenticated users via backend and for guests via localStorage, returning unified profile data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, global focus and button styles, and onboarding animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Provides helper to return cover image URLs based on category and kid-friendly mode.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Manages engagement data in localStorage including streaks, badges, shares, and bonus story unlocks.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI languages to corresponding font utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported languages and localized UI strings for the app interface.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Provides kids-mode category filtering and checks for kid-safe categories.
frontend/src/lib/notifications.ts: Utility for checking notification permissions and showing test notifications.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Handles storing and checking onboarding completion state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/profileValidation.ts: Validates usernames and image inputs for profile settings.
frontend/src/lib/readingProgress.ts: Saves, loads, clears, and calculates story reading progress from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Manages reminder settings and determines whether daily reminders should be shown.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Implements sharing utilities for app and stories with Web Share API and clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/lib/storyDraft.ts: Provides word counting, read-time calculation, story form validation, and localStorage helpers for saving and loading story tags.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI languages to backend languages and retrieves story content or translation availability based on language.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content using English as fallback.
frontend/src/lib/uiPolish.ts: Defines shared UI constants for sizes, spacing, layout, transitions, and styling tokens.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for detecting preview mode and encoding/decoding category IDs for URLs.
frontend/src/lib/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages guest profile persistence in localStorage with get, save, and clear utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Displays static About Us page content with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Shows a grid of categories with covers and handles navigation to category detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Loads and displays stories for a category with language and mode filtering plus navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Displays user's favorited stories or placeholders when empty or loading.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Renders premium subscription page with plan selection, benefits, and simulated subscription flow.
frontend/src/pages/HelpAndSupport.tsx: Shows help tips, contact info, social links, and support information within a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Fetches and displays featured stories, categories, latest stories, ads, and notification banners on the home tab.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumSuccess.tsx: Shows a confirmation screen after premium activation with benefits and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the app’s privacy policy content inside a legal-themed layout.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: Displays user profile info, authentication controls, badges, and user-created stories.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides story search with filtering, sorting, and results listing using user-selected language.
frontend/src/pages/StoryEditor.tsx: Offers a full editor for creating or editing stories with fields, validation, image upload, and read-time calculation.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Interactive story reader with language selection, scroll tracking, progress persistence, favorites, sharing, and offline download handling.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Static terms-and-conditions page rendered inside a legal layout.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers and manages the service worker with update checks, skip-waiting, and auto-reload on activation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with safelisted classes, custom colors, themes, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements to fix onboarding navigation and PWA caching issues.
